description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the kernel streaming service driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38242), ensure that you apply the appropriate updates for the respective Windows builds:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB articles listed below according to your Windows version.

2. Restart your system after installation to confirm the changes.

**Details**:
- For Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems, apply update KB5043080.
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, apply update KB5043076.
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, apply update KB5043076.
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, apply update KB5043067.
- For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems and 32-bit Systems, apply update KB5043083.
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2 for each architecture, apply KB5043064.

Refer to the provided links for the update packages:
- [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
- [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
- [KB5043083](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083)
- [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm the current Windows version on the system to ensure the correct update is applied.
- Backup critical data before proceeding to ensure recovery in case of an issue.
